metadata.synopsis: Lobby warning guard AD that points players to the main guard in case it spots players right in front of the lobby door
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Run up to  - S_LOW_CountingHouse_LobbyCheckpointWarning_Trigger - 61fa3f8c-8297-4b22-9da5-2f0d4978fffd - (-111 11 -234) while the main guard is busy (talking to another player or away)

1.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
1.text: Best behaviour down in the vaults - there's worse than us guarding the place.

2.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
2.text: Captain needs to see your pass!
